urls.description: We strive to ensure the safe and timely delivery of your baggage upon your arrival to your destination. You may track its status through any of the options below. Simply enter your bag tag number (assigned to you during check-in) or the booking reference number (the si x-digit alphanumeric code on your booking confirmation) and your last name in the fields below to follow your bag's journey.
